full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Solicitation Information

* **Solicitation Title (English)**: W8484-241006 - DND Advertising and Marketing in support of CAF Recruitment - RFP
* **Solicitation Title (French)**: Activités de publicité et de marketing du ministère de la DN à l’appui du recrutement des FAC - DP
* **Solicitation Reference**: WS4589760033-Doc4596886225
* **Amendment Number**: 7
* **Publication Date**: 2024-05-21

## Tender Details

* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-06-25T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2024-08-01
* **Expected Contract End Date**: Open ended, with possible multiple option periods
* **Procurement Category**: Service (SRV)
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding

## Service Requirements

The Department of National Defence (DND) requires the services of a firm specializing in advertising and marketing to support Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) recruitment. The scope of work includes:
- Account management
- Strategic planning and development
- Creative and technical production
- Media planning and management
- Digital engagement strategies
- Marketing and partnership activities
- Reporting and evaluation

The contract will be executed through a Request for Proposal (RFP) process and is open to all eligible firms. The contract will be for a period of one year, with possible option periods to extend up to three years.

## Security Requirements

Due to security requirements, this solicitation will not be limited to holders of a Supply Arrangement (SA).

## Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Radouane, Ruby (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email**: ruby.radouane@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Notice URL**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19770933?extsite=MTk3NzA5MzNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Note: I did not include regions of opportunity as the text indicates it is not relevant. Also, no attachments were provided. If you need to include them, please let me know! I kept the note URL as it seems to be the most relevant piece of information in this case.  There is no contact information provided
